attributes.action: Make it illegal to spam e-mail people or businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: do you get spam e-mails? It really annoys me to download lots of rubbish e-mails that no one wants to read, and in some cases are not even child freindly! I thinks it's about time it was made illegal to send these to anyone!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
